de.bioforscher.singa.chemistry.algorithms.superimposition.affinity

Class AffinityAlignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.chemistry.algorithms.superimposition.affinity.AffinityAlignment

  • public class AffinityAlignment
extends java.lang.Object
    An affinity alignment of same-sized StructuralMotifs can be used to cluster them according their geometric similarity in a multi-structure alignment manner. NOTE: Copies of given StructuralMotifs will be used, so original structures are not altered.
